title: Vox Machina Ep. 47 - The Family Business
description: Vox Machina return to the city where much of their history began: Westruun. But all is not well! Not only have the Chroma Conclave decimated the city, but another strangely familiar threat has taken hold of the city as well...
content:encoded: Vox Machina return to the city where much of their history began: Westruun. But all is not well! Not only have the Chroma Conclave decimated the city, but another strangely familiar threat has taken hold of the city as well...
